title: Notable ETF Inflow Detected - SQQQ - Nasdaq.com
text: Looking today at week-over-week shares outstanding changes among the universe of ETFs covered at ETF Channel , one standout is the ProShares ProShares UltraPro Short QQQ (Symbol: SQQQ) where we have detected an approximate $68.1 million dollar inflow -- that's a 6.5% increase week over week in outstanding units (from 31,721,230 to 33,771,230). The chart below shows the one year price performance of SQQQ, versus its 200 day moving average:
